column3:
â€œChocolate Kush has been one of the staples in my medicine cabinet for nearly 2 years now. It's an extremely well-rounded hybrid that honestly doesn't seem sativa dominant to me. Maybe I'm consuming a different breeder's Chocolate Kush, but regardless, this strain I keep receiving is wonderful.
Effects are mostly in the body for me with a slight head change. Mellow, but not going to knock you out unless you go overboa...â€
â€œthis shit layed my friend anthony outâ€

â€œi'd been smoking bubba kush for like ten hours one day. hooked up with the chocolpe kush, spun up a fatty, and the next thing i know my hearing was all fucked up and i was wrecked. crystal laden, dense ass nugs. nice smell and taste.â€

â€œIt's really good for what it is, which is very specific. 

First of all my research shows this is a indica dominant hybrid and that's exactly how it felt. Also known as Chocolope Kush this indica strong strain makes the user VERY tired and relaxed. If you have trouble sleeping or need to relax after a long day of work then this strain is for you. 

It's NOT good for laughing at a movie or going out with friends. The ...â€

â€œA nice strong Kush strain with a wonderful aroma.  I needed 5-6 hits to get thoroughly wrecked but it still seemed manageable unlike some other non-kush strains.  Recommended if you're going to socialize or wait in a long line.â€

â€œAfter taking a bong hit of this strain, it did not take too long to begin feeling effects. The high is still subtle though. It comes in like a small wave from the sea. I felt happy, no negative thoughts came through my mind, even though it was a miserable day outside. Comfort and relaxation took control of my body. I did not feel lazy, I just felt comfortable. Like when you come back from outside during the winter an...â€

â€œChocolate Kush has proven itself to be a great medication for me. Helps with appetite/nausea issues, PTSD, and insomnia for me. It smells and tastes yummy, and is pretty damned smooth! Definitely one of my favorites.â€
â€œChocolate Kush - Indica with Mazar origins. Strong smell but not at all like Chocolate, Normal taste, Mellow body high, Decent head high. Really nice looking buds.â€
â€œSurprisingly good for getting things done. Near the end tho can become couchlocky.â€
â€œChocolate Kush - Indica with Mazar origins. Strong smell but not at all like Chocolate, Normal taste, Mellow body high, Decent head high. Really nice looking buds.â€

â€œA recent acquisition from the local coffeeshop, Choco Kush and its offspring are mostly indica-dominant hybrids with a surprisingly positive effect on the mind.
The scent and flavours aren't anything out of the ordinary, I'd almost even call it a bit bland.
Its effects make up for its bland flavours by offering all the indica benefits with a calm euphoric effect from its hybrid status. The iconic 'munchies' kick in d...â€

â€œBest with greek and or mediterranean antipasta. We were very stoned before, but this high soothed our stomachs after munchin down on some King supers donuts. Pretty good nugget. Dried out after a night, Legal Meds sold it to me soaking wet.... But it was aight. Nice taste. Coco kush.... not bad guys.â€
â€œloved it!!! smoked one joint and the flavours erupted with a earthly taste that left a kind of numb felling as I was smoking it.â€
â€œchocolate kush is great smokeâ€
â€œTASTES GREAT AND WORKS FAST...  GOOD PAIN RELIEVER.  LASTS 2-4 HOURS.  VERY STRONG AND IT IS A VERY POPULAR STRAIN IN SEATTLE, WA.â€

â€œThis is my first time trying this strain and it was wonderful!! I take it for medicinal Chronic Health issues!! This kush helped me for the first time in a long time I would definitely suggest those with emotional issues try this Chocolate Kush!!â€
â€œchocolate kush is great smokeâ€
â€œHad to pick up an ounce of this amazing strain!  Everything is perfect, nothing compares. ğŸš€High as ever and very medicated. ğŸ‘â€
â€œFantastic!â€

â€œChocolate Kush pretty under rated strain.Smell clear clean pine,jet fuel,earthy,kushy and small tones of cocoa.Taste of clean pure pine,jet fuel,menthol,cocoa flavor's.Effect light body buzz  feel's like you been zapped or stunned type feeling but very minimal.Last couple of hour's or more.
Effect of clear focus head wise and  touching aches/pain's.
1:1 sublingual 5mg b.i.d. on deck usually dose anxiety 1/10 pain 2/1...â€
â€œvery good nice taste nice smell good for relaxation and overall just a very good strain i will buy alot from now on!â€

â€œThis Choco Kush is kicking my ass right now! The high seemed at first that it would be a creeper, but all of sudden it hit. Right now, things are magnified, sounds, movements. I feel like my thoughts are being speakerphoned out my ears, good thing they're not! I feel so relaxed, and a bit spacey. I'm loving this strain so far!â€

â€œSwift but gradual entry, a sneaker wave out of the mist.  Had 40mg an hour and a half ago; almost immediately felt muscles changing and bones realigning to equilibrium.  A little restless for the first twenty minutes or so, since then it's been smooth sailing.  Contrary to expectations, I'm feeling a bit couch-locked; I'm glad I don't have anything critical to accomplish for the rest of the afternoon.â€
â€œIts really nice for just laying down and chilling after a long or one last high for the die.â€
â€œFeeling relaxed and tiredâ€

â€œafter vaping this I went over to my husband that was sitting at the kitchen table and told him that I feel Invincible. Then I leaned and whispered into his ear, all creepy like, and said that I needed him to drink something. He started laughing nervously and acted all freaked out which made me want to act even more creepy.â€
â€œIts really nice for just laying down and chilling after a long or one last high for the die.â€
â€œThe Hit":  Tastes and hits great from both the bong or a vaporizer.  Gives even a seasoned smoker that "I gotta cough twinge".  On the insta-cough scale
column4: I'd rate it a 7.5 or so.  5 minutes afterwards
column5: the high will feel like a 8.5/10.

column1: Appearance/Density:  Frosty white with crystals showing through a healthy emerald green bud underneath.  Almost looks white fuzzy moldy it's so covered in crystals (it's not actually...â€"

Mind , not heady or speedy . Also did not have huge negative of the majority of Indica's ... Instant drowsiness . Relaxes my muscles and relived my back pain .â€

â€œOne of my favourites for all around appeal and most importantly affect. The scent of certain phenotypes of this strain are unbelievably inviting. The chocolope smell and taste that are so unique and appealing in their own right get blended with an awesome Kush scent leaning slightly to the OG#18 side, almost reminiscent of the Holy Grail Kush also by DNA.  Back to the affects it effects... Perfect hybridization of in...â€

â€œAs a woman with MS and Fibro, this is my strain of choice.  It kills muscle spasms, headaches and pain.  Pretty impressive.  Great taste when vaporized.  Absolutely wonderful.  Puts me right to sleep.â€
â€œI liked the strain on how high it got me, not too much of a taste thoughâ€

â€œVery relaxing & chill. Left me thinking deeply and appreciative; intensified my emotions and triggered nostalgia; does not taste like chocolate, but makes you feel like melted chocolate, indeed. Great strain. High was top-shelf, taste was top-shelf, & it looked top-shelf.â€
â€œOK strain, not something I would get agin.â€
â€œThis is a creeper give it 20 minutes to kick in. This is also a very good sleep aid.â€
â€œGood Strain, good taste but the buzz was a bit of a let down.â€

â€œChocolat Kush  is own of my favorites but people get confused with this strain. Chocolate Kush isn't a powerful THC level strain, but this is very powerful and High in CBD levels. Great for medical choice for patients.
 Strong chocolate Aroma, Hints of Vanilla and Sweet Earthy Skunk flavored. Dark green with brown Hughes and a thin layer of trichomes on the Surface. My feellings is Creative Emphoria, Focus, and happyâ€

â€œYesterday I tried Chocolate Kush for the first time, after hitting the bong, it only took 5 minutes to find myself lying in my bed wondering if studying for my math final or hitting that shit again. Well, I failed the test. I experienced a good solid high and felt extremely relaxed.â€

â€œi picked up a gram from NorthSeattleMedCo on Greenwood righ before Holman roAD IF driving south. . this is a dense little dark dank nugs. The green hit tastes earthy,  minty,  chocolatty sticky.and hella stanky wifh high THC.   NOT good to try and stop your mind because your brain is working overtime.   thank Linda for that sunshine in my day.â€
â€œI like it. But then leaflife would never steer me wrong.â€
â€œSmall dense buds with a good earthy flavor, could be smoother. A tired but focused high with a case of the munchies. Wish it was more euphoric and longer lasting.  Best out of bong or pipe.â€
â€œDanky Sativa has that Herer flavorâ€
â€œchocolate taste on exhale,all around good hybrid.. good ratio of indica to sativaâ€

â€œYou can smell a hint of that chocolate. The buds are pretty dark. Taste isn't bad. Perfect for knocking out after smoking.â€

â€œIt's a cool strain. The batch I'm smoking are of little buds which gets you that head high that lasts for a cool 20 minutes which then turns into a slow come down. 

Didn't give it 5 stars due to the times it can be harsh but would definitely cop again.â€
â€œIt was amazing for the most partt, other than the fact that sometimes I would have moments of paranoia. That hasnt hapoen to me with any other kind.â€

â€œUplifting, euphoric. My experience with this kush is phenomenal. Never before have I felt this energetic from kush. If you're interested in a couchlock/energetic high (Because it can go both ways. At least for me), purchase some of this.â€
â€œexcellent! !!!â€

â€œMazar crossed into an Indica mother creates this extremely fascinating strain. Now  the bag appeal is amazing with sugary fire hairs and sweet spicy aroma...yet the chocolate flavoring is minimal at best and actually tastes more like an earthy spicy sweet smoke....yet the effect is pleasantly surprising...it is mellow with pain relief, allows you to think creatively and articulate your thoughts. There is no couch loc...â€

â€œSmells a bit like blue dream, tastes like burnt coffee, a little dark chocolate, maybe s'mores? relaxing, got a bit hungry, and sleepy. Slept really well! My variety was actually listed as leaning towards indica?â€
â€œNot very strong with a rich deep taste! More for taste than to get you high!â€
â€œawesome strain taste like chocolate, uplifting immediately then gently lowers you back down.â€

â€œGreat strain, had a joint with this mixed in with some white shark and that was a deadly combination. Has an earthy but sweet smell and the taste is very similar. Has a nice relaxing indica body high with a slight cerebral high. Defiantly a must try. 4/5 starsâ€
â€œEugene og has someâ€

â€œVery interesting type of high. When I got some of this kush, it looked like some mediocre reggie weed but after a few hits from a bowl I realized looks can be deceiving. It produces a very heady high.â€

â€œI got to try this hybrid last night. It smells awesome with a hint of vanilla and chocolate together. The taste is better than the smell with a nice mild choc taste. The high hits evenly with a cerebral high and a euphoric feeling all over. Sure relieves my arthritis pain. This is a strain that I will definetely smoke again.â€
